Assumptions
  • 1. Wiring lengths and length of earthing conductor are estimated and can be changed as per site conditions. If cable lengths varies, it will be charged as per actual.
  • 2. Solar panels tilt angle is 10 degree facing true south (can be changed).
  • 3. Space for earthing pit points should be provided by the clients.
  • 4. Inverter to be mounted beneath the mounting structure.
  • 5. SRE cost doesn't include roof bearing capacity or its associated inputs/analysis.
  • 6. Client is responsible to arrange a clear and safe access to the roof/ground.
  • 7. There should be no shading issues on the site and if there exist any it will be client's responsibility to remove it.
  • 8. Net metering cost included, Other fee file process in customer scope of work. Name change and sanction load increase in customer's scope of work.
  • 9. Client to provide separate room for inverter and charge controller installation.
  • 10. SRE shall provide One year after sales service, which includes 4 visits.
  • 11. Load balancing for the domestic systems will be client's responsibility. Smart meter is not included in the quote.
  • 12. The material once delivered at the client's premises will be his responsibility. Any theft, or incident leading to any kind of damages will be at the client's end.
Terms and Conditions
Delivery of equipment at site
10-15 days after the advance payment (Depending on shipment)
Installation of complete system
20 working days
Disclaimers:

Cost is valid till 7th June 2024 and is subject to reconfirmation at time of order placement. Please note that all costs given are only for the projects in discussion, hence as standing instructions, kindly do not use or assume below prices for any other project because of variances in quantity, costs, freight, exchange rate, etc. The costs given are inclusive of duty/tax and if altered at the time of order placement then they shall be applied accordingly. Above lead times do not include 3 working days of PO processing time, and Advance Payment Cheque clearance from the Bank. Change in the Dollar price may affect the overall project cost. The company reserves the right to amend the costing if the validity of the quotation is expired at the time of installation. Kindly note that all the local taxes, import duties, sales taxes, excised duties, any other government/DISCOs levies, if imposed after the contract signing till the Net-Metering installation, will be borne by the client. The price increase (if any); will be imposed on the entire local as well as imported components price. The quote can be null and void at any time due to Dollar instability.

Warranty Information
  • Solar Panels: 10 year manufacturing warranty, 25 years power warranty
  • Other Equipment: Warranty as per Manufacturer's Term
